string_table.string: Utiliser les touches W (vers le haut), A (à gauche), S (vers le bas) et D (à droite) pour se déplacer dans l'image à 360 degrés. Appuyer sur la touche Tab pour passer aux marqueurs interactifs et aux zones de clic.

Fermer les paramètres de la vidéo
Paramètres de lecture de la vidéo
couper le son de la vidéo
Sous-titres codés. Appuyez sur la barre d'espace pour activer et désactiver les sous-titres.

slidelink.displaytext: Extension of the 12V with The 48V on-board electrical system
Voltage ranges of the 48 V on-board network
Topology of The 48 V On-Board Electrical System
Variants Designe and Structure of P1
Variant designe and structure of the P0

search.slidetext: welcome 48v on-board electrical system start start start goumri ibrahim

agenda mhv structures voltage ranges in 48v on-board electrical system 12v & 48v correlation topology of the 48v on-board electrical system isg & rsg – components & structure 3 phase electric machine block diagram & network charging functions - boost & buck mode diagnosing and testing interlock circuit overview of data record – 12v & 48v safety regulation coolant system goumri ibrahim

mhv vehicle structure two variants are available p1 configuration isg – integrated starter generator 16 kw / 250 nm p0 configuration rsg - riemengetriebenen starter generator belt driven starter generator 10 kw / 160 nm 12v 48v isg 12v 48v rsg goumri ibrahim

extension of the 12v with the 48v on-board electrical system the 48 v on-board electrical system complements the conventional 12 v on-board electrical system. the 12 v is no longer supplied by a 12 v alternator but by a dc/dc converter instead. bi-directional energy flow n83/1 dc/dc converter g1/3 48v lithium-ion battery a79 isg m1/10 rsg c & d 48v consumers g1 12v battery a & b 12v consumers goumri ibrahim

p = u . i 12 v . 250 a = 3kw 48v . 250a = 12kw goumri ibrahim the question of why precisely 48 v voltage ranges of the 48 v on-board network > background information on the voltage ranges:  under 60 v, remains in the low voltage range.  52 v to 54 v is the top function range; with functional restrictions for component part protection.  in the range from 24 v to 36 v, consumers are shut off to retain startability.  under 24 v, the starting procedure is no longer possible. a 60 v, contact protection area b 58 v, overvoltage range c 52 v to 54 v, upper operating range with functional limitation d 48 v (36 v to 52 v), operating range without functional limitation e 36 v to 24 v, lower operating range with functional limitation f 24 v to 20 v, undervoltage range additional info additional info additional info

the two generation of isg power electronic ac/dc isg gen 2 isg gen 1 goumri ibrahim structure and component parts p1 the engine does not have a belt drive isg positioned between the internal combustion engine and the transmission the isg also offers the opportunity to generate torque and to support the internal combustion engine using the energy from the 48 v on-board electrical system battery reduction of the fuel consumption better agility – boost and recuperation powerful cooling of the internal combustion engine additional passenger comfort a79 isg n129 ac/dc power electronic g1/3 lithium-ion battery n83/1 dc/dc converter f153/2 48v fuse box m75/11 electric coolant pump a9/5 electric refrigerant compressor info info info

back exit back back exit back back exit back back exit back back exit back back exit back goumri ibrahim structure and component parts p1 – isg 48v fuse box 48v fuse box 48v fuse box isg gen 1 isg gen 1 isg gen 1 power electronic ac/dc power electronic ac/dc power electronic ac/dc electric water pump electric water pump electric water pump electric refrigerant compressor electric refrigerant compressor electric refrigerant compressor electric turbo compressor electric turbo compressor electric turbo compressor

back exit back two belt tensioner goumri ibrahim structure and component parts p0 – rsg belt-driven starter alternator. substitutes the starter and the 12 v alternator. generating torque and supporting the internal combustion engine using energy from the 48 v battery. the electrical control of the belt-driven starter alternator is performed by integrated power electronics control unit. boost and recuperation m1/10 rsg with ac/dc m75/11 water electric pump g1/3 48 v lithium-ion battery f153/2 48v fuse box n83/1 dc/dc converter info info info

the terminals 41 are also directly connected to the chassis ground. unlike standard connectors, the 40 terminals are built with extra safety guards to ensure that the connector will never touch the vehicle's ground and cause a dangerous arc. back exit back goumri ibrahim 48v terminals terminal 40 - 41 in 12v terminal 30 is battery positive terminal 31 is battery negative in 48v terminal 40 is li-battery positive terminal 41 is li-battery negative represented by a pink strip info info info

the dc/dc converter transforms in buck mode the 48v voltage into 12v with a power of 3kw . in boost mode it converts 12v to 48v . in addition it takes care of the energy management of the 48v network and it deactivates the 48v network after engine stop . back exit back power-pack overview goumri ibrahim the 48v power-pack consist of : a dc/dc converter a 48v lithium-ion battery the dc/dc converter is the master control unit for energy management of the 48v on-board system a cooling plate with a heating element is sandwiched between the dc/dc and li-battery. info info info

back exit back lithium-ion battery overview goumri ibrahim the battery consist of 12 li-ion batteries cooling and heating plate bms – battery management system integrated contactors and cell temperature sensor info info info

charging function both batteries are sufficiently charged, no interaction needed. goumri ibrahim a continues charging energy flow to the 12 v battery during stop phases and driving in this case, ready is displayed in the ic while driving, a sufficient charge reserve is maintained in the 48 volt battery at all times

charging function supply functions at standstill to 12 v goumri ibrahim a request is sent to the dc/dc converter and the charging process begins the exchange of energy is done via a direct path from the li-battery and dc/dc to the 12v battery 12v energy management detects a drop in charge via the battery sensor

charging function external charge goumri ibrahim to do this, it is necessary, exactly as in a conventional vehicle, to connect a 12v charger (charging current > 10 a) the 12v on-board network management detects the external load and informs the 48v network management, which activates the 48v/12v dc/dc and recharge the 48v with energy from 12v network after a few min,the 48v battery has absorbed enough energy to start the engine if the 48v battery is no longer sufficiently charged to start the engine, it must be recharged first

isg – disassembly isg gen1 goumri ibrahim - a special plate that must be screwed to the rotor and stator before the motor and crankshaft screws can be loosened. - if this is not done, the rotor and stator will be attracted by the magnetic force and it will be impossible to separate them. in this case, the isg will be destroyed!

if the problem exists, replace the electrical machine gap mm : 0.9 the specified measurement value must be complied with at all four measuring points isg - test bench clearance measurement goumri ibrahim

isg - test bench perform resistance measurement of coils of integrated starter alternator goumri ibrahim 18 coils are connected, in each case, in star arrangement in phases (u), (v), (w) and (x), (y), (z). the phase resistance must be measured with a 4-way milliohm meter to prevent incorrect measurements.
the inter-lock circuit overview goumri ibrahim

incorrect you have not selected the correct answer. continuer continuer continuer continuer continuer continuer correct that is correct! you have selected the correct answer. continuer continuer continuer continuer continuer continuer rsg p0 isg p1 integrated starter generator rsg belt-driven starter alternator isg ac/dc power electronic dc/dc buck/boost mode converter buck mode energy flow from 48v to 12v boost mode energy flow from 12v to 48v choose the correct answers
